short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: CornerStone helps boost productivity with an improved user interface and user experience in v2.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
CornerStone: Redefine Your Productivity

Take control of your day with CornerStone, the ultimate productivity extension. Transform your new tab into a beautifully personalized workspace, designed to keep you focused and organized.

Features:

Daily Wallpapers: Start your day with stunning backgrounds.
Set Your Main Goal: Define and display your priority for the day to stay on track.
Task List: Organize your to-dos and check them off as you complete them.
Workspaces: Group your favorite links by category and open them with a single click.
